text: Jamie Cullum (born 20 August 1979) is an English jazz-pop singer-songwriter, musician and radio presenter. He has recorded eight studio albums, three compilation albums, one live album and twenty-four singles. He began presenting a weekly Tuesday evening jazz show on BBC Radio 2 in 2010. He was born in Rochford, Essex. == Discography == * Heard It All Before (1999) * Pointless Nostalgic (Candid, 2002) * Twentysomething (Verve, 2003) * Catching Tales (Universal/Verve, 2005) * The Pursuit (Decca, 2009) * Momentum (Island, 2013) * Interlude (Island, 2014) * Taller (Island, 2019) == References == Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:English singer- songwriters Category:English guitarists Category:English pianists Category:English pop singers Category:English pop musicians Category:English radio personalities Category:Jazz singers Category:British jazz musicians Category:Musicians from Essex Category:Singers from Essex Category:Writers from Essex
title: Jamie Cullum
